text.headline: Golf on Lake Travis
text.text:
The Travis Club is a proposed residential community with a golf course and marina near Lake Travis in Travis County just west of the state capital in Austin, Texas.

The Travis Club Phase One Final Plat has been approved in July 2023. The Phase One Final Plat includes 53 single-family lots, six open space lots, four multi-family lots, three golf course lots, one marina, one drainage lot, and two sales lots. The development will cover 339.97 acres and will be partially located in the City of Briarcliff ETJ. Water will be provided by the Vista Municipal Utility District of Travis County. Additionally, approvals were made for the Travis County Subdivision Construction Agreement with HH-CH-B Blue Lake, LLC and the Travis Club Subdivision Phasing Agreement in Precinct Three.
